attributes.action: Introduce lower stamp duty for listed buildings..........
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The heritage of our old buildings is being lost because many are put off purchasing them due to upkeep as repairing and upkeeping is expensive. If the stamp duty was reduced on these buildings it would compensate for the increased cost of repair and the stress of dealing with the listed building consultant at the local council. I know as I waited six months while they agreed on what type of roof tile I could buy, and don't think I was receiving a grant, I was not.
